{{Infobox item poe2
| name           = Dead Man's Note
| icon           = poe2 expedition_report_p4 icon.png
| description    = Ulög -

There's a new shipment for your Roparu friends waitin' near the lift in Delver's Row.

Come get the food 'fore the cave stink rots it.

Your mad captain, Morena

P.S. Give the old man my regards. I put an extra koīki in there just for him.

P.P.S. Don't say I never done anything nice.
